Class BoardNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoardNode
  • public class BoardNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Board node is holding information about NPCs on it.
    Version:
    13 October, 2018
    Author:
    Dmytro Sytnik (VanArman)

        Returns:
        int reward when plant kills zombie

      • plantFightZombie

        public Zombie plantFightZombie​(Zombie zombie)
        Simulates fight between current Plant instance and given Zombie instance
        Parameters:
        zombie - Zombie object to fight with
        Returns:
        Zombie iff not ded; otherwise Zombie with updated health
